name: Blinded
note: Attacks –1 die, attacks vs you +1 die

name: Charmed
note: Cannot harm charmer, charmer gets +1 die on interaction checks

name: Deafened
note: Attacks –1 die, attacks vs you +1 die, fail hearing checks

name: Disoriented
note: All checks and attacks –1 die

name: Dominated
note: Controller dictates your actions

name: Dying
note: Make Survival checks, die after 2 failures

name: Frightened
note: Must fight/flee/fawn, all checks –1 die

name: Ignited
note: Take 1d8 Heat Damage each turn

name: Incapacitated
note: Cannot act, attacks vs you +1 die, all hits are critical

name: Insane
note: Unpredictable, prone to madness and dangerous behavior

name: Petrified
note: Transformed to solid substance, take half damage

name: Poisoned
note: Take 1d6 Chemical Damage each turn

name: Prone
note: Attacks –1 die, attacks vs you +1 die, crawl movement

name: Reckless
note: Your attacks +1 die, next enemy attack +1 die (stackable)

name: Restrained
note: Speed 0, cannot use Speed actions, attacks vs you +1 die

name: Slowed
note: Speed halved (rounded down)

name: Stunned
note: Actions per turn halved (rounded down)

name: Unconscious
note: Cannot act, attacks vs you +1 die, all hits are critical

name: Weakened
note: Resistance checks vs status effects –1 die

name: Vanished
note: Teleported or disappeared, effects vary
